items.title: Fall in Love With These Paranormal Romance Manga
items.description: The love interests in these paranormal romance manga get sacrificed to snake gods, live as Otaku vampires, and more

items.title: 8 Books About Disaster for Anxious Readers
items.description: Do you cope with anxiety by reading about survival? If so, try some of the books on this list, which look at catastrophes across history.

items.title: Whimsical Whodunits: Cozy Fantasy Mystery Books
items.description: Prepare for the stress to melt away with cozy fantasy whodunnits that have everything from gargoyles to a vampire couple who run a B&B.

items.title: The Best Book to Capture What Dreaming Feels Like
items.description: The splashes of vivid colors, reality merging with otherworldly, and relatable anxieties meld to create a dreamlike experience.

items.title: Love and Likes: 6 YA Romance Books Featuring Social Media
items.description: Social media plays a big role in teenagers' lives today. These YA romance books show the highs and lows of growing up online.
